label: 大宮
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: One of the Hiyoshi shrines. Its principal deity is Ōkuninushi, enshrined there by Saichō, the founder of the Enryakuji Temple on Mt. Hiei, to serve as guardian of the mountain. [日吉神社、最澄、延暦寺、比叡山]
